overview_of_class: This course will be an exploration of several different philosophical, ethical, and political questions about the organization of society. We'll begin with an investigation of political liberalism. Then we'll consider issues regarding the nature of political authority. Next, we'll discuss testimony and social power. In the final part of the course, we'll consider a range of moral and political questions involving the social roles of children and non-human animals.
